data.text: @itsthewhosane @Elex_Michaelson Because March 11th is the filing deadline for candidates to enter the 2022 elections

@Elex_Michaelson Its because the midterm elections are coming up and their polling numbers are plummeting due to their restrictions. They think they will look like the good guys and say we got rid of the masks, look how great we are!

@Elex_Michaelson Did the change in how it was and should have always been being reported make the difference  or political science? Kids have always been low risk and now Newsom is taking credit for it.
@Elex_Michaelson Where are the death stats on this chart?
@OCHalosFan @Elex_Michaelson In 10 - 15 years we will learn the true damage to our childrens lungs from breathing through Chinese made masks @UTLAUncensored
@Elex_Michaelson Or perhaps they never should have had any masking rules, especially K-12
@itsthewhosane @Elex_Michaelson New candidates must declare candidacy by then. It’s a well timed “event” intended to distract.
@Elex_Michaelson And this is for the whole state, including the 50 counties that basically ignored the entire mask mandate anyway. 🤣
